solution_line_template: The total ratio representing the 500 cards is {ellis_ratio_part}+{orion_ratio_part} = <<{ellis_ratio_part}+{orion_ratio_part}={total_ratio_parts}>>{total_ratio_parts}

The fraction of the total ratio that represents the number of cards that Ellis got is {ellis_fraction_numerator}/{total_ratio_parts}, and since there were {total_cards} cards, Ellis got {ellis_fraction_numerator}/{total_ratio_parts}*{total_cards} = <<{ellis_fraction_numerator}/{total_ratio_parts}*{total_cards}={ellis_cards}>>{ellis_cards}
If there were {total_cards} cards, and Ellis received {ellis_cards} cards, Orion received {total_cards}-{ellis_cards} = <<{total_cards}-{ellis_cards}={orion_cards}>>{orion_cards} cards
The number of cards that Ellis received more than Orion is {ellis_cards}-{orion_cards} = <<{ellis_cards}-{orion_cards}={difference_in_cards}>>{difference_in_cards} cards.
